alert.note: Alert for Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 01 at 2:13PM CDT until September 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Elevated Fire Danger Through Labor Day... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton. * WINDS...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start may have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning or any activity that involves sparks is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
